name: Daily Sales Report
query:
SELECT
    si.posting_date AS "Tgl:Date:150",
    si.name AS "No Faktur:Link/Sales Invoice:150",
    si.customer AS "Customer:Link/Customer:200",
    si.remarks AS "Keterangan:Data:200",
    -- Payment Info
    SUM(CASE WHEN pe.mode_of_payment = 'Cash' THEN per.allocated_amount ELSE 0 END) AS "Tunai:Currency:120",
    SUM(CASE WHEN pe.mode_of_payment = 'Bank Draft' THEN per.allocated_amount ELSE 0 END) AS "Bank:Currency:120",
    SUM(per.allocated_amount) AS "Jumlah:Currency:120"
FROM
    `tabSales Invoice` si
LEFT JOIN
    `tabPayment Entry Reference` per ON per.reference_name = si.name
LEFT JOIN
    `tabPayment Entry` pe ON per.parent = pe.name AND pe.docstatus = 1
WHERE
    si.docstatus = 1
    AND si.outstanding_amount = 0
    AND (si.company = %(company)s OR %(company)s IS NULL)
    AND (si.posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s)
GROUP BY
    si.posting_date, si.name, si.customer, si.remarks
ORDER BY
    si.posting_date DESC
